doc:
Larry Pine https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Larry_Pine 0 Larry Pine (born March 3, 1945) is an American actor. A veteran of the Broadway stage, he began his career playing the role of Fop in the 1968 production of Cyrano de Bergerac. He has since starred in film and television, with roles on series including As the World Turns, One Life to Live, All My Children, Hostages, and House of Cards, and roles in films including Alone in the Dark, Plain Clothes, Vanya on 42nd Street, Dead Man Walking, Before and After, The Royal Tenenbaums, Maid in Manhattan, Melinda and Melinda, Killing Kasztner, Moonrise Kingdom, Jimmy P: Psychotherapy of a Plains Indian, and The Grand Budapest Hotel. Larry_Pine ( born March_3_,_1945 ) is an_American_actor . A_veteran of the_Broadway_stage , he began his_career playing the_role of Fop in the_1968_production of Cyrano de Bergerac . He has_since_starred in film_and_television , with roles on series_including As the_World Turns , One_Life to_Live , All_My_Children , Hostages , and House of Cards , and roles in films including Alone in the_Dark_,_Plain_Clothes , Vanya on 42nd_Street , Dead_Man Walking , Before_and_After , The_Royal_Tenenbaums , Maid in Manhattan_,_Melinda_and_Melinda , Killing_Kasztner , Moonrise_Kingdom , Jimmy_P : Psychotherapy of a_Plains_Indian , and The_Grand_Budapest_Hotel .
